scripts.optimize: npm run optimize:images && npm run optimize:css && npm run optimize:js

scripts.optimize:css: echo 'CSS optimization: Install cssnano or similar tool'
scripts.optimize:js: echo 'JS optimization: Install uglify-js or terser'
